attributes.action: To release the truth about the UFO/UAP Phenomenon.
attributes.additional_details: The planet isn't doing well, these sightings go back through out our history if they are extraterrestrial in origin we have a right to know, if they are benevolent they could help us as we are still here we can assume they aren't malevolent. More disclosed research needs to be done we need to know what or who they are and we as tax paying citizens have a right to know and we want to know.
attributes.background: Release all files and information on the subject, to study it more, to trust the public with the truth that so many people already believe, to take into consideration various religions and beliefs, to be aware that most people want the truth and are ready for the truth.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make an FOI Request to the MOD at:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-defence

We could publish a petition calling for the Government to restart investigations into UFOs and to open a new reporting channel as part of that, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
